instapaperlib.py
================

Python library for the instapaper.com API.

http://instapaper.com

Usage:
-------

::

    import instapaperlib

    instapaperlib.auth("username", "password")
    instapaperlib.add_item("username", "password", "URL", "title")


Installation
------------

  pip install instapaperlib

Or, if you must:

  easy_install instapaperlib
